4373.title: third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions
tosdr.tldr: third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

4374.title: Site uses first-party cookies, web beacons, and other anonymous tracking information

tosdr.case: This service requires first-party cookies, which are cookies that only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy states that "We may use cookies, web beacons, or other anonymous tracking information to improve our server's interaction with your computer. " This makes sense when you consider the fact that slither.io is an MMO; it makes sense for the serivce to track its players to an extent. The game also tracks the last skin you used, which is probably where the cookies come in.  It's not specified how using trackers to collect information is expected to improve server interactions however.

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read

4376.quoteText: We may occasionally revise our privacy policy by posting the changes here.
4376.title: The service makes critical changes to its terms without user involvement

tosdr.case: The service makes critical changes to its terms without user involvement
tosdr.tldr: The privacy can be revised, but there is nothing about notifying users about changes.
